handle(uint32,bytes32,bytes).details: _origin Source chain domain identifier (not currently used).

params._sender: Address of the sender on the source chain.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateSenderAdapter(uint256[],address[]).details: Owner update sender adapter address on src chain.

executedMessages(bytes32).notice: Ensure that messages cannot be replayed once they have been executed.

handle(uint32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Called by Hyperlane `Mailbox` contract on destination chain to receive cross-chain messages.

senderAdapters(uint256).notice: Sender adapter address for each source chain.

setIsm(address).notice: Sets the ISM for this adapter/recipient.

documentation.text:
@notice Sender adapter address for each source chain.
 @dev srcChainId => senderAdapter address.

@notice Ensure that messages cannot be replayed once they have been executed.
 @dev msgId => isExecuted.

@notice Emitted when the ISM is set.
 @param module The new ISM for this adapter/recipient.

@notice HyperlaneReceiverAdapter constructor.
 @param _mailbox Address of the Hyperlane `Mailbox` contract.

@notice Sets the ISM for this adapter/recipient.
 @param _ism The ISM contract address.

 @notice `IBridgeReceiverAdapter` implementation that uses Hyperlane as the bridge.
